addPoint

public void addPoint(GmlPoint point)
Adds a GmlPoint to the stroke
Points are added even if outside of the bounding box.
The normalization util might be run to fix that afterward.
This allows more flexibility when loading GML which doesn't comply with the 0-1 limit

Parameters:
point - - GmlPoint

addPoints

public void addPoints(List<GmlPoint> pts)
Adds a list of GmlPoint to the stroke

pts - - List
